channel.title: Posts on Karteek's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Karteek's Website

item.title: Ironman 70.3 North Carolina
item.description:
I will be signing up for the Ironman 70.3 event in Wilmington, North Carolina to race in October 2026. I need to figure out a way to finalize my gear first. Find a bike that suits my fat ass and a breathable tri-suit that doesn’t feel like a fucking straitjacket.

Will keep adding shit here as I finalize my regimen and plan. Stay tuned!

item.title: First Post
item.description:
Hello â€” this is the first post on the site. I’m trying to dip my toes into building SSGs using Hugo. This website uses the Chicago7 theme - It is styled after the old Macintosh System7 OS and has monospaced font inspired by the classic Chicago typeface.

More to follow..
